summary: The sprint planning architect proposed a narrowed re-execution of Sprint 2 (SP-002) focused solely on the mock login user story (US-010) for isolated testing, overriding broader previous scopes to ensure a quick, self-contained setup.

decisions.title: Pivot to lightweight re-run of SP-002
decisions.details: Scope limited to US-010 only, bypassing US-016 and NFR-001 for focused testing of login redirect to dashboard.

actions.task: Save the proposed sprint and update US-010 status to 'In Sprint' with re-run notes, pending client confirmation.

backlog_deltas.title: Status updated to 'In Sprint' with notes for re-run in SP-002
